Articles.Content:
So I clicked something during my design process in the SPH and the mirror symmetry changed to the VAB one. What's the shortcut for that?

Also there was some other shortcut added in 0.25 making stuff attach only when on nodes. Haven't figured that out either.
"R" is the hotkey for toggling between symmetries
Yup, "R" to change symmetry mode. Also, the other key for attaching parts to nodes is "alt".
